intro: Dasymaschalon dasymaschalum, commonly known as the broad-leafed hibiscus, is a flowering plant native to tropical and subtropical regions. It belongs to the Malvaceae family, which includes hibiscus and cotton. The plant is characterized by its large, showy flowers that typically range in color from white to pink and red.
